entry.title: $2300 // Lovely Townhouse Floor-thru Railroad Apartment with Garden Access!
entry.content:
Lovely floor-thru railroad apartment on garden level of three-family townhouse.
On 14th Street near 4th Avenue.
One interior bedroom with no windows and one larger bedroom -- both with ample closets. One den/dining room in middle of apartment.
Living room with 2 large windows and an ornamental fireplace on street side.
Eat-in Kitchen overlooks backyard with two large windows.
Five rooms in all.
2 separate entrances on opposite ends.
Nice tiled bathroom with full bathtub.

Beautiful backyard shared by 3 tenants, complete with shady tree and bbq.
Must see, lovely space!

Great block, 14th Street between 3rd and 4th Avenues.
amazing neighborhood!
Near all amenities and shopping on 3rd, 4th and 5th Avenues.
Near Prospect Park, Farmers Market, Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Gardens, Greenwood Cemetery, Smith Street, Red Hook, Carroll Gardens, Greenwood Heights, truly situated near so many great hoods!!
Near F, R, G trains. 2 stops from Atlantic Avenue hub.

Cats welcome, no dogs, no smoking.
Good credit and employment a must.

$2300, includes heat and hot water. No fees.
First, last, one month security for move-in.
Available Sept. 1st.

Please email me for an appointment to see it.
Owner-placed ad.

entry.title: $2000 // Nice 2 Bedroom Apt.
entry.content:
Nice 2 bedroom apartment .

* No broker fees
* One year lease
*Application and background check required.
* To move in you'll need - first month rent and one month deposit.

* Please note that you must have good landlord references, good credit and references proof of income.
